tool_description: SimpliVPN VPN API allows anyone to create their own VPN application with our easy to use API. Our API provides you with access to completely build and manage your VPN application easily through integrating with our simple API and through our powerful management dashboard. Sign up at https://vpnapi.simplivpn.net
name: SimpliVPN VPN
title: SimpliVPN VPN

api_list.name: GetServers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simplivpn-vpn.p.rapidapi.com/servers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simplivpn-vpn.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
